page.title: 19A Wildlife Area.
page.content: Our school had a grant from{Shell}to make a wildlife area,which we called {Little Brook Furlong.}Mr.Hooper,who owns the Grange old people's home,lent us some of his garden and we have used it to make a large pond.Mr.Fowles borr -owed a J.C.B. and dug the hole for us one wet Saturday morning.On Monday all the children carried newspapers and old carpets down to line it.Then we rolled the lining down and Mr.Phillips helped us spread it out.The pond was filled by the firemen.They pumped in about{17,800}litres of water.We left it to settle over the holiday,as crea- tures don't like chlorine in water. Then we put in water plants and frog- spawn.So far,we have found{nine diff- {erent species}in our pond,including a fierce looking horse leech.We have al- so put in lots of plants to attract butterflies and other creatures.
